en.ApplicationService-note-clientPassphrase: Client's private key passpharse for the application service
en.ApplicationService-note-serverPassphrase: Server's private key passpharse for the application service
en.ServiceToken-note-source: Used to identify each of register request, aims to reduce the number of service token for a application service
en.Product-note-reclaimQrCode: Turn on to clear all of QR Codes Inventory and the related Stocks
en.Member-note-phone: 8 to 15 number digits and not start with 0
en.Member-note-password: Minimum 8 characteres (at least 1 uppercase character, 1 digit, and 1 lower character)
en.Member-note-temporaryPassword: Temporary Password for the Forgot Password
en.CountryCode-note-smsAlphanumeric: Is supported alphanumeric Sender ID for the SMS sending
en.CountryCode-note-orderingValue: Descending Order, high ordering value will become higher priority for display
en.User-note-browserDeviceToken: Special for Service Worker Browser Push
en.User-note-password: Minimum 6 characteres including at least one uppercase character
en.SystemIdentity-note-signupTc: Only for signup with commpany page
en.SystemIdentity-note-overDraft: Only for display and will be reset every month
en.SystemIdentity-note-receiveSettlementSta: Receive Daily Member's Points Settlement Statement
en.SystemIdentity-note-pointLogo: Large Point Icon with Service Name
en.SystemIdentity-note-disableShipping: Disable Shipping Flow from your customer checkout flow
en.SystemIdentity-note-disableDeerCategory: Disable for showing all of categories belonging to DEERMember
en.SystemIdentity-note-annualResetTo: Client's Member Point reset to point
en.SystemIdentity-note-lastAnnualCleanAt: Client's Member Point last cleaned at
en.SystemIdentity-note-lastAnnualCleanTime: Client's Member Point last cleaned at time (using for system compute)
en.SystemIdentity-note-showNavigator: Show Top Mavigator for the client app page
en.SystemIdentity-note-autoAssignToMember: Turn on to auto assign this service to a new member once create member from DEERMember platform
en.SystemIdentity-note-disableEmail: Disable any function related to email notification
en.PointSettlementProcess-note-clientIdenti: Identity ID to identify something in the source application (e.g. Task ID for reward task, Activity ID)
en.PointSettlementProcess-note-freezed: Once the task is freezed, the process will not be executed
en.PointSettlementProcess-note-errorTry: The record will be locked after errorTry is reached 5 times
en.PointSettlementProcessHistory-note-clien: Identity ID to identify something in the source application (e.g. Task ID for reward task, Activity ID)
en.PointSettlementProcessHistory-note-freez: Once the task is freezed, the process will not be executed
en.PointSettlementProcessHistory-note-error: The record will be locked after errorTry is reached 5 times
en.PointHub-note-freezed: Once the task is freezed, the process will not be executed
en.PointHub-note-errorTry: The record will be locked after errorTry is reached 5 times
en.PointHubTransaction-note-freezed: Once the task is freezed, the process will not be executed
en.PointHubTransaction-note-errorTry: The record will be locked after errorTry is reached 5 times
en.Contact-note-phone: 8 to 15 number digits and not start with 0
en.ChannelYoutube-note-enabled: Display in the App Channel List
en.ChannelYoutube-note-syncInfoNow: Turn on if you want to update the channel information from Youtube manually
en.ChannelYoutube-note-syncVideoNow: Turn on if you want to update all of videos from Youtube manually
en.ChannelYoutube-note-autoSync: Synchronize the Target Channel Info automatically
en.ChannelCategory-note-ordering: Descending Order, high ordering value will become higher priority for display
en.ChannelYoutubeVideo-note-enabled: Display in the App Channel Result List
en.ChannelYoutubeVideo-note-syncNow: Turn on if you want to update the information from Youtube manually
en.ApplicationConfig-note-iosForceUpdate: Everytime update the IOS version, then the forceUpdate will be turned off. You can turn on it if need to force user update the application.
en.ApplicationConfig-note-aosForceUpdate: Everytime update the Android version, then the forceUpdate will be turned off. You can turn on it if need to force user update the application.
en.ApplicationConfig-note-iosVersion: The latest mobile android application version. The version will be used to compare the force update / minor update
en.ApplicationConfig-note-aosVersion: The latest mobile android application version. The version will be used to compare the force update / minor update
en.ApplicationConfig-note-aosStore: Link to the google play store
en.RewardTask-note-stickOnTop: Always display on the top of task list
en.RewardTask-note-ordering: Descending Order, high ordering value will become higher priority for display
en.RewardTask-note-showAtList: Show To Task List in the mobile application
en.RewardTask-note-useQrCodeModule: Show QRCode Scanner Module in the mobile application
en.RewardTask-note-useAdvModule: Show Advertisement Module in the mobile application
en.RewardTask-note-useWebviewModule: Show Camera Module to view the target URL in the mobile application
en.RewardTask-note-isDirectReward: Directly Assign the task reward to the target member, otherwise need to manual approve the task reward
en.RewardTask-note-rewardPoint: Maximum: 9,999 points, reward point for every time joining the task
en.RewardTask-note-modeMax: Total Number of times / days to join the task
en.RewardTask-note-maxRewardType: Mode for distribute the reward point to participant
en.RewardTask-note-maxPoint: Maximum: 9,999 points, maximum Point Level for the point distribution
en.RewardTask-note-rewardAccumulativePoint: Maximum: 9,999 points, accumulative reward point for every time joining the task
en.RewardTaskLookup-note-accumulativeCount: Accumulative total number of times for joining task
en.RewardTaskLookup-note-accumulativePoint: Accumulative total number of points gained for joining task
en.Permission-field-serviceApplyApiQuery: Service  Apply  A P I Query
